input_text:
Job Title: Business Analyst/Product Owner

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
Description

Aretum is looking for a dynamic and experienced individual to join our team as a Business Analyst/Product Owner. As a Business Analyst/Product Owner at Aretum, you will be responsible for capturing and defining detailed business requirements and acting as a liaison between stakeholders and the development team. You will have the opportunity to shape and prioritize product features, ensuring successful project delivery and customer satisfaction.

Aretum is a leading government contracting company, specializing in providing innovative technology solutions to Federal clients. We are committed to delivering high-quality products and services that meet the unique needs of our clients and contribute to their success.

Responsibilities

Act as a strong IT Business Analyst and Product Owner for one or more large, complex projects with high value to the organizationWorks with cross-functional, self-managed development teams and various stakeholders, including analytics, design/user experience, engineering, and user enablementBuild and maintain Agile (Scrum / Sprint) team backlog with input from various team membersCollaborate with other Product Owners, Agile teams, and business owners to gather requirements, creating a shared understanding with stakeholdersWrite user stories and requirements that include clear acceptance criteriaFacilitate meetings with development and quality assurance teams to drive the implementation of all functional and non-functional requirements to completionParticipate in testing when neededReview completed work products prior to delivery

Requirements

Highly self-motivated and directed, able to exercise independent judgment and take actionExcellent analytical and creative problem-solving skillsExcellent listening, interpersonal, written, and oral communication skillsLogical and efficient, with keen attention to detailAbility to effectively prioritize and execute tasks while under pressureStrong customer service orientationExperience working in a cross-functional team-oriented, collaborative environmentProficiency in MS Office (Word, PowerPoint, Excel, Visio)Certified Agile Product Owner or Scrum Master a plusMinimum Secret Security Clearance (or Interim) is required before start.IAT Level II Certification (Security+ CE, GICSP, CND, or equivalent) is required before start.Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience.Experienced in full life cycle hands on development and implementation of enterprise applications, web-based applications.5+ years of working with software development teams in an Agile environment5+ years experience as scrum master, product owner, QA Tester, software developer or business analystExperience with JIRA/Confluence or similar tools.

Benefits

ARETUM is an equal opportunity employer, committed to diversity and inclusion. All qualified candidates will receive equal consideration for employment without regard to disability, race, color, religious creed, national origin, sexual orientation/gender identity, or age.

ARETUM utilizes e-Verify to check employment authorization.

EEO/AA/F/M/Vet/Disabled.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

Build and maintain Agile (Scrum / Sprint) team backlog
Collaborate with other Product Owners, Agile teams, and business owners
Gather requirements and create shared understanding with stakeholders

Facilitate meetings with development and quality assurance teams
Drive the implementation of all functional and non-functional requirements
